EmailTemplate.subject: Do You Follow These 4 Virtualization Best Practices Today?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
CUT DATACENTER COSTS LIKE AWS: Managing the Economics of Your Virtualized Datacenter A FREE VMTurbo Whitepaper <http://bit.ly/1dUDu07> Today, you could get 20-40% more from your existing infrastructure, so why aren't you? As cloud economics threaten the long-term viability of on-premise data centers, the survival of IT organizations rests solely in their ability to maximize the operational and financial returns of the existing infrastructure. You want to survive, and this brand new whitepaper will help you answer these 4 questions:
- How efficient is my virtualized data center? - How do I optimize workload placement within my clusters? - How do I reclaim unused server capacity? - How do I show my boss that this saves money? Read It Now <http://bit.ly/1dUDu07> 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
